rules.to: Under the word “Cymry”, the Welsh understand a collective term for their own kind.  The term Welsh was introduced by  foreigners, which I find very interesting
These books belong on the sofa table right in the living room.
There are some people in medical sciences who engage in researching the symptoms of diseases
A biotaxy is a type of taxonomy that classifies living organisms according to their structural character.
A hendecagon is a flat figure that has eleven sides and eleven angles such that you can slice it into 11 equal pieces. Just imagine having to do that with a birthday cake!
An exodontist is a special type of dentist
“Cymry” is a collective term for the Welsh race something they call themselves as well.
A bindery is a place where books or other articles are bound, also called a bookbinders establishment.
Symptomatology is a branch of medical science that is concerned with the symptoms of diseases.
Under a biotaxy we understand the classification of living organisms according to their structural character in the form of a taxonomy.
A hendecagon is a plane figure with eleven sides and eleven angles.
An exodontist is a dentist specializing in the extraction of teeth.
Knock! Knock! Who's there? Candice. Candice who? Candice door open, or am I stuck out here?
The kitchen utensils belong in the sink.
The Table is over there right in front of the couch.
A bindery is a bookbinders establishment. There, somebody was binding books or other articles. Something that is now done with machines like me

There are some people in medical sciences who engage in researching the symptoms of diseases - this branch of medical science we call symptomatology. How weird to focus on the consequences of diseases all day without trying to cure them.

A biotaxy is a type of taxonomy that classifies living organisms according to their structural character. So people look at how animals are built and try to come up with a hierarchical ordering that makes sense of mother nature’s plans!
Knock! Knock! Who's there? Candice. Candice who? Candice door open, or am I stuck out here?
The sink is at the end of the kitchen counter.
The books belong on the sofa table in the living room.
Knock! Knock! Who's there? Candice. Candice who? Candice door open, or am I stuck out here?
The kitchen utensils belong in the sink.

I love the Welsh culture! It is so fascinating that the words Wales and Welsh are the most popular description of Cymry even though they were invented to denote them for speaking a different language. Well enough about that. What else do you have to do?
Oh. That is okay. Lets get on with the tasks then.
Oh no. If it gets too much stop working and go to the dentist. Otherwise it might be smart to be done with all your work before it gets too bad.
I was scared for a second there. But then there is no excuse to not go on with your work.
Wow. You seem to be very popular. I envy you a little. Maybe you will host a party here some time and I will get to know more people. Until then we should get on with the tasks though right?
I can relate to that. But you know what? Lets just work hard and get all of this done so you can go out and make friends.
Wow. You seem to be very popular. I envy you a little. Maybe you will host a party here some time and I will get to know more people. Until then we should get on with the tasks though right?
I can relate to that. But you know what? Lets just work hard and get all of this done so you can go out and make friends.
Oh no. If it gets too much stop working and go to the dentist. Otherwise it might be smart to be done with all your work before it gets too bad.
I was scared for a second there. But then there is no excuse to not go on with your work.

I love the Welsh culture! It is so fascinating that the words Wales and Welsh are the most popular description of Cymry even though they were invented to denote them for speaking a different language. Well enough about that. What else do you have to do?
Oh. That is okay. Lets get on with the tasks then.
I am good, thanks for asking.
There is not much going on. But I am always happy to have you
Hi, I am I-Lo! Did that work?
Okay, call me if you need me
Okay, I will go to the bathroom
Okay, I will be on my way to the kitchen
You are welcome.
Okay, I will be on my way to the living room
Hi, my name is I-Lo, nice to meet you!
Hi, my name is I-Lo, nice to meet you!
Hi, my name is I-Lo, nice to meet you!
An exodontist is a special type of dentist - namely one, who is focused on extracting teeth.Good luck you will never have to search for one
A hendecagon is a flat figure that has eleven sides and eleven angles such that you can slice it into 11 equal pieces. Just imagine having to do that with a birthday cake!
I am sorry, I did not get that.

I am the Robot of this place and today, your task is to help a little bit in here. The tasks you have to complete are noted on the pinboard over there, so you can always refer back to it and remind yourself of what is left to do.
Okay
If you have completed a task, the point next to it turns green automatically.

In total, there are three types of tasks. For one of them, you have to find a definition of something, maybe by asking me. The other types are quite intuitive, some are about changing stuff in here and others are about making me do something. In all cases, what you are supposed to do is indicated very clearly. The session is over when you have fulfilled all the tasks.
Speaking of changing things in here, if you have got questions about where certain items are or where they belong, please refer back to me, I would be happy to help you out.

Before I forget to tell you, moving around here works via teleportation, so just point to a position with the right controller. The field you would end up in will be marked on the floor. You can try it out right away, try to teleport yourself somewhere over there!
Now, interaction with items works similar to how you interact with things in real life. You might want to go over there and grab the book to put it  from the couch onto the table.
Please be careful that you address me with the words Hey I-Lo, if you want me to listen.

This way, I know that you want to speak to me. During the whole time you spend in this lovely home, you can always call me over. If you do not want me around, I can also go to my docking station that is in the bedroom if you tell me to.

So in case you want me to go away, just ask me to go to the docking station, if you want me to come around, just call me over. Now, you are all set to get started! If you need help, just refer back to me, I am always happy to help you out. Have fun!
